org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.converter

Interface LayoutConverter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChainConverter, Converter_2009_03_16_to_2016_07_15, Converter_2010_01_12_to_2009_03_16, Converter_2010_03_19_to_2010_01_12, Converter_2013_07_15_to_2010_03_19, Converter_2013_07_15_to_2016_07_15, Converter_2016_07_15_to_2013_07_15, Converter_2016_07_15_to_2017_07_15, Converter_2017_07_15_to_2016_07_15, Converter_2017_07_15_to_2018_07_15, Converter_2018_07_15_to_2017_07_15, Converter_2018_07_15_to_2019_07_15, Converter_2019_07_15_to_2018_07_15

    public interface LayoutConverter
    Interface for converters that convert a page layout to comply with a certain format version.
    Author:
    clc

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ConversionMessage> checkForCompliance(PageLayout layout)
      Checks if the given page layout is consistent to the target format version of this converter.
      java.util.List<ConversionMessage> convert(PageLayout layout)
      Converts the given page layout to the specified target format.
      org.primaresearch.io.FormatVersion getSourceVersion()
      Format version before the conversion
      org.primaresearch.io.FormatVersion getTargetVersion()
